PHRASE.LANG: This armour doesn't protect much but also doesn't weigh the wearer down. Change faction colours on this chest item by simply altering your hair colour. Gear up and become a warrior of the Colosseum! [#Legal]

Cette armure n'offre pas beaucoup de protection mais elle est légère. Changez les couleurs de faction sur cet objet simplement en modifiant votre couleur de cheveux. Préparez-vous et devenez un guerrier du Colisée ! [#Legal]

Dieser Harnisch bietet nicht viel Schutz, doch er beschwert den Träger auch nicht. Wechsle die Gruppen-Farben auf diesem Rüstungsteils, indem du einfach deine Haarfarbe änderst. Mach dich bereit und werde ein Gladiator des Kolosseums! [#Legal]

Quest'armatura non protegge molto, ma allo stesso tempo non appesantisce chi la indossa. Cambia il colore di fazione di questo articolo semplicemente modificando il tuo colore di capelli. Preparati a diventare un gladiatore del Colosseo! [#Legal]

Esta armadura no protege mucho, pero tampoco es demasiado pesada para su portador. Cambia el color de los atributos de este artículo para el pecho alterando símplemente tu color de pelo. ¡Prepárate para convertirte en un guerrero del Colesium! [#Legal]

This armor doesn't protect much but also doesn't weigh the wearer down. Change faction colors on this chest item by simply altering your hair color. Gear up and become a warrior of the Colosseum! [#Legal]

This armor doesn't protect much but also doesn't weigh the wearer down. Change faction colors on this chest item by simply altering your hair color. Gear up and become a warrior of the Colosseum! [#Legal]
